details.purpose: Record the quantitative measurement of cardiac enzymes in plasma or serum

items.items: Follow up test to determine if enzymes levels have changed over time
Generic laboratory result archetype to allow terminology driven results on a generic framework

Quantitative measurement of cardiac enzymes in plasma or serum REF: European Heart Journal (2002) 23, 1809Â–1840 'Management of acute coronary syndromes in patients presenting without persistent ST-segment elevation' - The Task Force on the Management of Acute Coronary Syndromes of the European Society of Cardiology Michel E. Bertrand, Chair, Maarten L. Simoons, Keith A. A. Fox, Lars C. Wallentin, Christian W. Hamm, Eugene McFadden, Pim J. De Feyter, Giuseppe Specchia, Witold Ruzyllo http://www.escardio.org/NR/rdonlyres/19004FCF-9E1B-4563-8C76-0460CAAAE09C/0/acs_euhj02.pdf
